brief.description: Slack is a cloud-based team collaboration and communication platform that enables real-time messaging, file sharing, and integration with third-party services.
brief.usage: Deployed by organizations across various sectors. Typical use cases include team collaboration.

vendorReputation.summary: Slack Technologies Inc. demonstrates mature security practices with an active PSIRT program.

vulnerabilityTrends.summary: No publicly disclosed CVEs found in recent analysis. This may indicate strong security practices or limited public disclosure.

incidents.summary: No Slack vulnerabilities appear in CISA's Known Exploited Vulnerabilities catalog, indicating no confirmed active exploitation.

dataHandling.summary: Enterprise-grade encryption typically implemented for data at rest and in transit per industry standards.

controls.summary: Enterprise-grade access controls, SSO, MFA, and audit logging available.

trust_score.rationale: Score based on 0 CVEs (0 critical, 0 high, 0 medium), 0 CISA KEV entries, HIGH PSIRT maturity, and Slack Technologies Inc. vendor reputation.

alternatives.rationale: Enterprise support available; Compliance: SOC 2, ISO 27001, FedRAMP, HIPAA
